articles.title: Living with BPH (Enlarged Prostate) - CodeBlue
articles.description: Men with benign prostate hyperplasia (BPH) can make lifestyle changes, take prescription medicines, or undergo minimally invasive procedures or surgery.

articles.title: Meet the man behind Poh Kim Video, Singapore's last DVD retailer: 'Many people gave up, but I persisted' - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: From rental tapes to 4K DVDs, Poh Kim Video has been in Singapore for 38 years. We chat with founder Lim Poh Kim to find out how it’s surviving the obsolescence of DVD players in an era of video-streaming platforms.
articles.content:
FROM VHS TO LASER DISCS TO VCDS
The business made hay while the sun shone but laser discs didnt stick around for long. In the early 2000s, VCDs began taking the world by storm. 
We were eliminated,… [+1646 chars]

articles.title: Tan Boon Hui, Arts House Limited executive director and former Singapore Art Museum director, dies at 53 - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The veteran Singaporean arts administrator, who died on Jul 7, led SAM for five years and organised two editions of the Singapore Biennale. He also had a stint as the director of the prestigious Asia Society Museum in New York.
articles.content:
Arts House Limiteds (AHL) executive director Tan Boon Hui died on Thursday (Jul 7). The veteran arts administrator was 53 years old.
Tan died from complications due to a stroke. According to reports… [+2780 chars]

articles.title: Singapore executes two drug traffickers despite pleas for clemency - CNN
articles.description: Singapore on Thursday executed two men for drug trafficking, ignoring pleas for mercy from human rights campaigners who fear "a new wave" of hangings in the Asian city state notorious for its strict drugs laws.
